message.entry: The {0} action already exists. Create an action server with a different name.
Unable to create an action server with name {0} and type {1}.
The action type {0} is invalid. To get a list of available action types, enter the "rostype.getActionList" command.
An error occurred evaluating the action server execute goal function. Ensure that the ExecuteGoalFcn property of the action server is set to a valid callback that will not error. Error details: {0}
An error occurred sending the action result from the server. Ensure result message structure is correct. Error details: {0}
An error occurred while shutting down the action server. It might still be registered with the ROS master.
